pages.text: $(thing)Blast Furnace Insulation$() is a more compact way to insulate your $(l:mechanics/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(). Rather than placing sheets around the chimney, $(thing)Blast Furnace Insulation$() is applied directly to the $(l:mechanics/fire_clay#fire_bricks)Fire Bricks$() using $(item)$(k:key.use)$(). When broken, the insulation and bricks drop separately.
Crafting insulation requires the same number of $(thing)Wrought Iron Sheets$() that would be placed around a single fire brick block.
